ReferenceDocuments.name: DICOM Instruction
ReferenceDocuments.description: Required if Image Type (0008,0008) Value 3 is ASL. May be present otherwise.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDS Example
ReferenceDocuments.description:
CONTINUOUS_a single long low powered RF pulse
PSEUDOCONTINUOUS_multiple short low powered RF pulses
PULSED_a single short high powered RF pulse
